text: Varzo is a comune (municipality) in the Province of Verbano-Cusio-Ossola in the Italian region Piedmont. Varzo is about northeast of Turin and about northwest of Verbania. It is on the border with Switzerland. As of 2004 about 2,209 people lived there. It has an area of .All demographics and other statistics: Italian statistical institute Istat. Varzo borders the following municipalities: Baceno, Bognanco, Crevoladossola, Crodo, Grengiols (Switzerland), Ried-Brig (Switzerland), Trasquera and Zwischbergen (Switzerland). ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Settlements in Verbano-Cusio-Ossola
title: Varzo
